SMW Subobject for Entrana/ZanarisImage: File:Sand pit.pngObject ID: 14890Uses infobox: SceneryIs members only: trueIs variant of: Sand pit

Sand pits are mostly used in glassblowing to train Crafting skill. Sand pits are located in Entrana, Yanille, Rellekka, Dorgesh-Kaan, Prifddinas and Zanaris.

Molten glass that can be blown with Glassblowing pipe is made by using Soda ash and a bucket of sand with a Furnace. Buckets of sand can be obtained simply by using an empty bucket with sand pit. Soda ash can be obtained by burning Seaweed on a Range or a fire.

If the player has completed The Hand in the Sand Quest then the player can get Bert to deliver 84 buckets of sand directly to the player's bank account daily (by asking directly). Doing this is a requirement for the Medium Ardougne Diary. Ultimate Ironmen may instead fill a bucket at Bert's sand pit to meet this requirement.

In the Enlightened Journey quest the player needs a sandbag. It can be obtained by using a sack with a sandpit.

Locations[edit | edit source]

The sand pit in Prifddinas is closest to a bank, but requires completion of Song of the Elves. The pit in Zanaris is the second closest and unlocked by completing Lost City. The Yanille sand pit is a good alternative for those that lack the quest requirements.

'''Sand pits''' are mostly used in glassblowing to train [[Crafting]] skill. Sand pits are located in [[Entrana]], [[Yanille]], [[Rellekka]], [[Dorgesh-Kaan]], [[Prifddinas]] and [[Zanaris]].

[[Molten glass]] that can be blown with [[Glassblowing pipe]] is made by using [[Soda ash]] and a [[bucket of sand]] with a [[Furnace]]. Buckets of sand can be obtained simply by using an empty bucket with sand pit. Soda ash can be obtained by burning [[Seaweed]] on a [[Range]] or a fire.

If the player has completed [[The Hand in the Sand]] [[Quest]] then the player can get Bert to deliver 84 [[bucket of sand|buckets of sand]] directly to the player's [[bank]] account daily (by asking directly). Doing this is a requirement for the [[Medium Ardougne Diary]]. [[Ironman Mode|Ultimate Ironmen]] may instead fill a bucket at [[Bert|Bert's]] sand pit to meet this requirement.

In the [[Enlightened Journey]] quest the player needs a [[sandbag]]. It can be obtained by using a [[sack]] with a sandpit.

==Locations==
The sand pit in Prifddinas is closest to a bank, but requires completion of [[Song of the Elves]]. The pit in Zanaris is the second closest and unlocked by completing [[Lost City]]. The Yanille sand pit is a good alternative for those that lack the quest requirements.
